underlying_goal: Fix a failing PPV subtitle check in a Playwright-based web scraping system that was returning low confidence scores
friction_detail: Claude initially tried multiple iterations of adding debug logging, changing wait states, and adjusting timeouts before discovering the root cause was that subtitles were rendered as images rather than searchable text.
brief_summary: User needed to fix a failing PPV subtitle check in Playwright; after several failed debugging iterations, Claude discovered subtitles were images not text, refactored detection to structure-based h3 img matching, and the check passed with confidence 5.
